overview:
Shlomo Argamon is CEO and Co-founder of Subtext3, whose unique demographic profiling technology is based on his pioneering research into computational authorship analysis. He also currently holds appointments as Associate Professor of Computer Science at the Illinois Institute of Technology and as a Senior Fellow at the Center for Advanced Defense Studies.

Dr. Argamon is the author of numerous scientific articles on authorship attribution, natural language processing, and machine learning, and is co-editor of the recent books The Structure of Style (Springer, 2010) and Computational Methods for Counterterrorism (Springer, 2009).
